title: Drawing, "Design for Textile Border with Garland of Red and Purple Flowers"
inscribed: Inscribed on verso in graphite, upper right: #J 132
description: Border design on maroon background: gray leaves and small red and purple flowers with smaller purple flowers in garland across bottom of sheet; color register along right margin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Textile Border with Garland of Red and Purple Flowers".
Gouache on off-white wove paper. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-395.
